name: Chun Yu
content: Chun Yu's Research Homepage Chun Yu Associate Professor Pervasive Interaction LabInstitute of HCI and Media IntegrationDepartment of Computer Science and TechnologyTsinghua University Address: Room 3-526, Building FIT, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084Email: chunyu at tsinghua dot edu dot cn [ Biography | Research Interests | Publications | Selected Honors and Awards | Teaching |Professional Services | Students and Mentoring | Invited Talks ] Biography 2017-2024, Associate Professor, Computer Science & Tech, Tsinghua University. 2014-2016, Assistant Professor, Computer Science & Tech, Tsinghua University. 2012-2014, Postdoc Fellow, Computer Science & Tech, Tsinghua University. 2006-2012, Ph.D. in Computer Science, Tsinghua University. 2002-2006, B.S. in Computer Science, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications. Research Interests My research centers on enhancing human-computer interaction (HCI) to facilitate more intuitive and efficient interaction between people and computers. I'm committed to creating significant HCI advancements through the integration of software, hardware, and AI, deeply informed by the human experience. This work has led to more than 80 publications in premier HCI forums, including ACM CHI, UIST and Ubicomp, and has garnered 14 awards for Best Paper or Honorable Mention. The practical applications of my research have been adopted by industry leaders and incorporated into widely-used commercial products, reaching over 600 million users.
